events.message: The policyholder has officially filed a claim after the vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the reported car collision.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the case, ensuring quick follow-up with the insured.
The insured received official acknowledgment of the claim filing including the next steps to be taken.
The agent requested additional documentation such as police reports and photos of vehicle damages.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including accident photos and the official police report.
An investigation commenced to verify the circumstances and extent of damages related to the accident.
The investigation concluded with findings supporting the customerâ€™s version of the accident.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the customer covering vehicle repairs and related costs.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and cooperation throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customer for vehicle repair expenses.
The claim was formally closed after payment issuance and confirmation of vehicle repairs.
All claim records were archived securely in the system for future reference and regulatory compliance.
